= Linux Bluetooth projects =

    * [http://jbluez.sourceforge.net/ JBlueZ] exposes the Bluetooth functionality provided by the BlueZ to J2SE
    * [http://dbus.freedesktop.org/doc/dbus-java/ Java D-Bus binding] enables you to use BlueZ D-Bus interface

= Related Open Source projects =

    * [http://lightblue.sourceforge.net/ LightBlue] a cross-platform Python Bluetooth API for Mac OS X, GNU/Linux and Nokia's Python
    * [http://org.csail.mit.edu/pybluez/ PyBluez] is an effort to create python wrappers around system Bluetooth resources GNU/Linux and Windows XP (Microsoft and Widcomm Bluetooth stacks)
